thread.title: Sidharth Malhotra is busy country-hopping!
thread.title_full: Sidharth Malhotra is busy country-hopping! - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: Sidharth Malhotra is busy country-hopping!
text:
Sidharth Malhotra has wrapped up the first schedule of Baar Baar Dekho with Katrina Kaif.

Sidharth Malhotra. Pic/Datta Kumbhar 
The actor, who had been in UK and Scotland for over a month, returns to Mumbai today.
He will be in town for a few hours before he takes off for New Zealand tomorrow. Freshly appointed as Tourism New Zealandâ€™s ambassador for India, Sid is flying off to Wellington and other cities to soak in the sights.
